articles.author: David Shepardson
articles.title: US raises concerns by Micron, Intel with China as export control meeting set to launch - Reuters
articles.description: U.S. Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo discussed concerns about restrictions on American businesses including Intel (INTC.O) and Micron
articles.content: BEIJING, Aug 28 (Reuters) - U.S. Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo discussed concerns about restrictions on American businesses including Intel (INTC.O) and Micron (MU.O) with Chinese Commerce Ministe… [+3964 chars]
